sentences.sentence: Everybody stared at me and started to yell. Now they all think I was masturbating.
sentences.translation: 所有人盯着我看，然后喊叫起来——他们都觉得我在施法。

sentences.sentence: On "Mad Men," young Sally Draper (played by 11-year-old Kiernan Shipka) is caught masturbating on the sofa at a friend's house.
sentences.translation: 上周的《广告狂人》里，年幼的莎莉(由11岁的希尔南·西普卡饰演)在小盆友家的沙发上摸得起劲的时候被撞了个正着。

sentences.sentence: On "Mad Men, " young Sally Draper (played by 11-year-old Kiernan Shipka) is caught masturbating on the sofa at a friend's house.
